artist: Artist: Ogata Gekkō; Publisher: Matsuno Yonejirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; battle scene; figure on horseback, wearing a black uniform, PR arm raised with a sword in hand on left; billowing smoke, with battling figures and a large, waving flag in ULQ of left sheet; figure in center, wearing a maroon top with ornate green square design on the back, falls off horse in center; various figures in colorful clothing fighting tow soldiers in black uniforms on right sheet; fallen figure, lying under the feet of horses in bottom center of sheet
inscription: on right sheet, on back, in LLC, in pencil: 6136.03
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: At Fenghuangcheng, Picture of Generals and Their Men Engaged in a Hard Struggle
